basics.name: Abolfazl Najafi
basics.label: Geotechnical Engineer
basics.summary: Civil and Geotechnical engineer with two years of experience in the design and supervising of various geotechnical and structural projects.

work.name: FE FALAT
work.summary: Cost and Income Specialist, focusing on checking and evaluating the invoices of site subcontractors. Geotechnical Engineer and QC Inspector.

work.name: ASAKAV
work.summary: Geotechnical design engineer, On-Site supervisor, and soil improvement expert. Geotechnical laboratory expert.

education.institution: Iran University of Science and Technology

courses: Design of Steel Structures I & II
Design of Concrete Structures I & II

publications.name: Modelling Initial Elastic Modulus of Sand-EPS Mixtures Using Evolutionary Polynomial Regression
publications.publisher: 39th National Congress and 4th International Congress of Earth Sciences
publications.summary: Investigated the use of expanded polystyrene (EPS) in soil stabilization, developing an EPR-based model to predict the initial elastic modulus of sand-EPS composites through triaxial compression tests, and conducted sensitivity and parametric analyses to understand the impact of confining pressure and EPS content on compressibility behavior.

publications.name: A polynomial model for predicting shear wave velocity from cone penetration test data
publications.publisher: 3rd International Conference on Civil Engineering, Architecture, and Urban Management in Iran
publications.summary: Developed a new polynomial regression model to correlate shear wave velocity (Vs) with cone penetration test (CPT) parameters, including cone tip resistance, sleeve friction, and vertical effective stress, using a global dataset, and demonstrated its improved reliability over existing CPT-Vs correlations.

projects.name: Master of Science thesis
projects.summary: Numerical modeling of caisson foundation for Offshore Wind Turbines, Sited on a liquefiable soil.

references.name: Professor M. H. Baziar
references.reference: Master of Science thesis advisor at Iran University of Science and Technology.

references.name: Asst. Prof B. Nadi
references.reference: Instructor of deep excavation stabilization in urban areas at IAUN university.
